# shared

**Type Property**

The shared instance you use to send permission requests and receive responses.

## Declaration

```swift
static let shared: AskCenter
```

## Overview

Use this singleton instance to access all [doc://com.apple.permissionkit/documentation/PermissionKit/AskCenter] functionality. The system maintains this shared instance across your app’s lifecycle and ensures consistent handling of permission requests and responses.

```swift
 let center = AskCenter.shared
 try await center.ask(permissionQuestion)
```
